option.name: text
option.value: Summarize this file in a couple of lines $CURRENT_FILE

option.name: text
option.value: Summarize this code in a couple of lines $SELECTION

option.name: text
option.value:
"Please provide clear, accurate, and concise documentation for the selected code. The documentation should:
Explain the purpose and functionality of the code. Describe each component and its role in the overall design. Highlight key features or design choices, such as modern UI elements, MaterialTheme usage, and responsive design. Be beginner-friendly yet informative enough for experienced developers to quickly understand the code." $SELECTION
